ResourceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice resource to attach the resource-based policy to.
ResourceArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice resource to attach the resource-based policy to.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:\S+$  
Update requires: Replacement

PolicyDocument.description: The JSON formatted resource-based policy to attach.
PolicyDocument.markdownDescription:
The JSON formatted resource-based policy to attach.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption
